messages.content:
### Intermittent fasting and insulin sensitivity
Recent randomized controlled trials demonstrate that intermittent fasting protocols, such as alternate‑day fasting, lead to significant improvements in insulin sensitivity. In an eight‑week study involving thirty participants, fasting participants exhibited a 15% reduction in HOMA‑IR compared with controls, indicating enhanced glucose metabolism (Mattson et al., 2020).
